title: UFC : most knockdowns landed by fighters worldwide as of March 2020
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of knockdowns landed in the y axis.
Month Donald Cerrone has the highest Number of knockdowns landed and Thiago Alves has the lowest Number of knockdowns landed.
The highest Month Donald Cerrone has 7.0 more Number of knockdowns landed than the lowest Month Thiago Alves.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of knockdowns landed in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Number of knockdowns landed 20.0 is found at Month Donald Cerrone and the minimum is found at Thiago Alves where Month is 13.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of knockdowns landed in the y axis.
Month Donald Cerrone has the highest Number of knockdowns landed and Thiago Alves has the lowest Number of knockdowns landed.
The highest Month Donald Cerrone has 7.0 more Number of knockdowns landed than the lowest Month Thiago Alves.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of knockdowns landed for 10 number of Months.
The maximum Number of knockdowns landed 20.0 is found at Month Donald Cerrone and the minimum is found at Thiago Alves where Month is 13.0.
Second maximum Number of knockdowns landed is found at Month Jeremy Stephens.
The difference of Number of knockdowns landed between the highest and lowest Month is 7.0.
The Month Donald Cerrone has the highest Number of knockdowns landed, followed by Jeremy Stephens, and Jeremy Stephens. Down to the Month Thiago Alves which is the lowest.
Over the past 10 Months, the Number of knockdowns landed has decreased.
Month Junior Dos Santos, Chuck Liddell, Lyoto Machida, and Mauricio Rua share the same value 14.0.
The Month Thiago Alves tends to be 1.32 percent lower than average.
The Number of knockdowns landed is 151.0 if we add up values of all Months.
